definition provided in the GHG Protocol for Project Accounting (which does not only refer to GHG
removals; see ‘Background’). It is not limited to asset-driven investments although projects in
own operations may imply new asset investments or new investments in existing assets. Projects
also encompass, for instance, new application for products. Examples of GHG removal projects
